chunk_text:
Ideal for
• Ceremony
• The important part
### Governor's house
Prepare for your special day on the second floor of our historic Governors Farm House, home of Oregon's 18th Governor, Ike Patterson. Featuring two ready rooms equipped with full sized bathrooms, lounge furniture, full length mirrors, and well lit make-up and hair stations.

metadata.title: Host Your Wedding at our Vineyard
